about.title: About Sabina Academy
about.subtitle: Leading education center in Baku, Azerbaijan

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Sabina Academy is an educational center established in 2022, specializing in English language teaching and international exam preparation. Our goal is not only to teach English, but to provide a structured learning system that leads students to real results and prepares them for the future.
story.paragraph2: The founder of the center, Sabina Mehraliyeva, is a CELTA-certified IELTS instructor (International House London, UK) with 20 years of teaching experience. Every year, Sabina Academy successfully supports hundreds of students in achieving high results in IELTS, Cambridge exams, and the DİM school-leaving English exam.
story.paragraph3: At Sabina Academy, teaching is based on modern methodology, proper level placement, and an individual approach. For us, the most important indicator is each student’s progress and success.
